name: Alisa Snider
text: We love Brixx pizza! All their pizzas are unique & delicious. They always have great beer on tap as well!

name: Megon Miller
text: We used to come here in the summer with the dog and eat out on the patio.  We were sad to hear they closed so we were relieved to hear they were reopening under new ownership.  We’ve been back twice since and so far it has lived up to our …More

name: Jennifer Kikta
text: Really good food and the pizza had great flavor. Dined with a family of four plus grandparents for friday lunch.The portions amounts were great for the price. Not all the food was delivered at one time, waited an extra 5-10 mins for my …More

name: Jimmy Kulina
text: My wife liked it a lot. I wasn't impressed though. 10.95 for these wings, which were pretty average. Could be because I had Ale Emporium wings yesterday, which is a tough act to follow.  Next time I'm in the mood for pizza and wings, I'll head over to Chatham Tap. The service was good and outdoor seating is nice.

name: Jeffrey Callaway
text: We (party of 5) enjoyed the pizza 11' (only size they have) we had 4 different pizzas. Everyone, yes I tried each one, of them was excellent.  Did not have to ask for drink refills they just showed up when we needed them. I will defintely go back.

name: Luis Ramirez
text: Like the service, good taste on pizzas, spicy  shrimps pizza delicious, lunch combo enough food at good price.

name: Dambiya Cheonsa
text: The pasta was delicious, as was the pizza, and the drinks! Our server was super nice too! We had a larger group and she took time and mad effort to ensure all of our orders were correct and that we were all taken care of!

name: Sarah Noll
text: We have been coming to Brixx since they opened and every visit has been a great experience.  The service is excellent with a very nice, relaxing atmosphere.  The pizza is fantastic and we were so excited they offered a cauliflower crust!

name: Molly Perry
text: I had the Greek pizza with their vegan cheese option! Super delicious! Great service as well.

name: Seth W.
text: Great food and drinks, only draw is mediocre service. Always enjoy the food here. Their pizza is one of my favorite "go to's" in Fishers. However the service is hit or miss. Tonight there were hardly any guests, yet our server seemed to …More

name: Mark Grogan
text: A very good experience. The pizza was great and there is a nice selection of beers. The service was great too

name: Sohail Amir
text: Located in the heart of downtown Fishers, this is one of the best places to get wood fired pizza. We eat here often and our favorite appetizer is their bruschetta. We also love their Greek and Hawaiian pizzas. The place has great atmosphere and you can choose to sit inside or outside. The servers are very friendly and food is very good.

name: Heidi Hopper
text: Delicious! Friendly staff, awesome patio, great food!

name: Ally Fleckenstein
text: Great great pizza! Perfect place to take the family! They have a cool chalkboard wall for kids to draw on (or adults) and their selections are always accommodating to most tastes. Love the service and location, too! The atmosphere is also happy and fun, never had to wait either :)

name: Ariel Hill
text: I only gave 2 stars because the pizzas was good. On the other hand our pizzas were all over the box the cheese and toppings was stuck to the box because the pizzas were tilted when put into the bag. And we couldn't tell two of the pizzas …More

name: Matthew Niedner
text: Excellent sports bar with an upscale ambiance and fare fit for foodies. Prompt and courteous service.

name: Khulthum Russell
text: The pizza was delicious 👌 but I don't like the addition of the bar. To me it destroys the atmosphere.

name: Tom Johnson
text: Actually I think this is Mona Lisa in Mackinaw City. A little pricey but ex excellent food. I had chicken parmesan, my wife had lasagna. Both were more than we could eat and could easily shared. The lasagna was delicious.  We did order cheesy  bread sticks. They were good too. Service was good and friendly. Thanks Laura!

name: Sirhc
text: Great food, great atmosphere and reasonably priced. Looking forward to returning. The menu is also very flexible according to your diet.

name: Carol Yang
text: Great menu with a variety of pizzas to suit everyone’s tastes! I was expecting something like Blaze but it was so much better!

name: Jenny Cozad
text: The food and drinks are good. Great prices and the staff is really friendly. The booths have chalkboard walls for anyone wanting to express some creativity. 🙂

name: Rose Smith
text: Yummy vegan pizza!  Build your own.  Vegan cheese is Daiya.  This one is margarita pizza with roasted peppers and onions mix added.

name: Kurt Auzins
text: Nice beer selection, great Monday craft beer specials, pretty good food, friendly efficient staff.

name: Sam B
text: Fantastic wood fire pizza and excellent services. My wife was craving wood fire pizza. Everybody in the restaurant was polite and helpful. The place is very clean and reasonable prices. This will be our favorite stop in Indianapolis. Good job guys.

name: Jeremy S
text: Bronx pizza was pretty good, nice outdoor seating.  Staff was nice.

name: Luke Feaster
text: Great food and a great atmosphere! Love their root beer!

name: Jeremy Eltz
text: Good thin crust pizza. Quality toppings. Lots of cheese. It could take 2 pizzas to fill me up though. Probably says more about me than Brixx. Some of the booths have chalkboard which kept my 2 year old entertained so we could actually enjoy the meal.

name: Liam Wallace
text: The Bronx Bomber pizza is....well, the BOMB! Also a big fan of all their apps and breadsticks. Good beer selection. My wife and I have always received good service when we've visited, and they're actually a pretty good place to go to watch …More

name: Melissa Crandall
text: We decided to have my kiddo's birthday lunch here. They were very accommodating. They took reservations, they saw us coming and had us come in the side door, the pizzas were delish, and they even had vegan options for one of our guests. They also let us bring a cake! Couldn't have asked for a better experience.

name: Ryan Wickersham
text: The pizza was good but I was surprised it had no tomato sauce. Was that on purpose?

name: Mike Mullen
text: Great service. Good food. Cold beer.

name: Kathryn Martinie
text: Kim, our server was amazing. The manager and rest of the staff was friendly and professional. The pizza was fresh and delicious. Definitely will be back!

name: Aly Ops
text: Loved their pizza! They also have cauliflower pizza which is pretty rare to find. I also loved the vibe, music and staff!

name: Dale and Pat Streeter
text: Great atmosphere.  Great prices!

name: Jared O'Dell
text: Great pizza place. Brixx Sticks were great. Took my sister for a bite to eat. She is not supposed to have dairy, so we were happily surprised they sub vegan cheese (Daiya brand, which actually melts great). Pizza, sticks, and buffalo wings were all very tasty! We will be back next we are in Fishers!

name: Katherine K
text: Ron is the absolute best worker! He answered my call at 10:30 to figure out what their last season wine was! He was so understanding and helpful and enthusiastic! Thank you for finding it what the wine was!

name: Jealeania Morris
text: Great customer service and food.

name: Evan Morgan
text: I love going to Brixx!  Great daily specials on beer, wine, and cocktails. It's a great place to watch sports and its open late.  I love the bartenders Suzy and Ron!  The entire staff is fun and friendly. Their patio is fun too.

name: Mary Johnson
text: Opps! I reviewed the wrong place. But the pie was excellent, the beer cold and the server attentive. Got to love it!

name: Cindy Hibbs
text: This used to be one of our favorite places. They've discontinued their specialty martinis, including our favorite Fair Pear. The bartender had zero personality and an attitude. The pizza was good still. The restaurant was nearly empty, when there was always a wait for dinner when we used to visit. We probably won't return.

name: Philip Skinner
text: Great gourmet pizzas.  Good beer selection. I believe Beer is 2.50 all day on mondays.

name: Mark Gruenberg
text: Food was great. Had my son's soccer team there and the boys really enjoyed the food. Service was great too.

name: Donna Frank
text: Great selection and great pizza.  Tasty healthy options and less healthy options.  Regular crust, whole wheat crust, and cauliflour crust choices are definitely a plus.    Will definitely return.

name: Kathi Gates
text: I love this place. All time favorite pizza and great servers. The margherita pizza is just like in Italy.  My son loves the chicken club sandwich and the pasta. My go-to restaurant on a weekly basis.

name: Dave W
text: Great variety for pizza combinations. Good choice of local breweries. Upscale atmosphere. Wood-fired makes all the difference in taste and flavor. Excellent choice for your next pizza!

name: Thomas Brink
text: Har the brachetta which was amazing

name: Blake Claxton
text: Been here a lot and it is always very good

name: Mario Massillamany
text: It was okay.  Nothing special.  Kids didn't like that there were some charred areas on the pizza.

name: Victoria Franklin
text: Came here for a date with my 3yr old son and had the best waitress ever! She was so sweet and attentive! The food was great and we got a lot for what we paid for. We will be back for a whole family date night!

name: Toby Davis
text: In my opinion, the best pizza place in the Indy area.  It's an 8.9 on the One Bite scale.  The ingredients are fresh, the dough is made fresh and it's the perfect thickness/cook.  The breadsticks use actual garlic butter which is too seldom …More

name: Collin Sexton
text: A friend took me out to this place. It was great. We were immediately seated and our food came out almost instantly. The waitress was exceptional (I can't remember her name, but she was 20 if that helps). We had pasta and pizza split …More

name: Deidre Coate
text: Great pizza! Never fails to please the taste buds!

name: Phil Myers
text: Absolutely love the drink specials! And the atmosphere is inviting and friendly. Oh yea, the pizza is pretty damn good too!

name: Olivia Euler
text: Extremely slow service when there were maybe 3 other customers in here total. Dirty environment and terrible music selection. Why did it take an hour to get my food when you can make it in less that five minutes and you have no other orders? I work in a restaurant too so I know how this is supposed to work.

name: Katie Blume
text: My husband and I love Brixx, the outdoor seating area is stunning and you are right in the middle of downtown Fishers.  On concert nights you can hear all the songs from the patio.  The service is friendly, I feel like they really go above …More

name: Shawn Blazier
text: Brixx has always been a favorite of ours but it had recently closed temporarily as new owners took over. This was the first time we went in since the ownership change. Unfortunately the food quality is not like it used to be. Most of the …More

name: Myrna Dowden
text: The best breadsticks I think I've ever eaten! Great staff also.

name: Jon Biddy
text: Love this pizza drove from Greenwood to eat here not disappointed.

name: Nadia E. Brown
text: Terrific service and good food! They even have vegan cheese for no extra charge. Great kids meal package. We'll be back

name: Aaron Justison
text: Monday’s are great!

name: Stephanie Box
text: I love the pizza here. Tonight we stopped in to eat and I decided to try a pasta dish. I ordered the wrong roasted chicken option (they have two), and they replaced it with the one I wanted very graciously with no fuss. They were beyond kind to me and I really appreciated it after the very long day and evening I had.

name: Brenda Miss Bee
text: Food has always been tasty, but the service is hit or miss.

name: Mattie McGee-Smith
text: Awesome pizza n wonderful Lemon Drop drinks.

name: Derek Long
text: Good was good and they were generious with the toppings.  One of the better brick over pizza places I have been too.  Bread sticks were a little small for the price and the cheese we got for then was not to our liking.

name: Jarrell Oliver
text: Fantastic food and very friendly and attentive staff.

name: Ryan landis
text: First time here and most likely last.  The wings aren't anything special at all plus 10.99 for 7-8.  The pizza took a while when literally the same thing blaze pizza does in 5-7ish minutes. Also the size is slightly bigger but costs 40% then blaze.  Not impressed at all.

name: Dominique Kizer
text: Their cauliflower crust is amazing.

name: Nicholas Phenis
text: Very friendly...great service and best of all amazing food!!!  Bravo!!!

name: Chris McConnel
text: I love the bartender and drinks here. Very easy place to stop in for a quick one.

name: John Wright
text: Good salads. Attentive service. No wow factor.

name: Melissa Schnepp
text: This place was awesome!  Food was good and reasonably priced, service was great.  Host, server and manager were all attentive and friendly.  Sat outside on the patio and really enjoyed the atmosphere.  Will be back again soon!

name: Kelsi Peacock
text: We have been here twice with a part of about 20 people and they were so great!  The chef is fabulous!  The food was enjoyed by all!  The waiting staff and owner are great to work with!  Thankful for this new restaurant in town with stellar service!  We will be returning customers!

name: Brett Sprunger
text: Pizzas are great!  Good wings and beer selection

name: Mary Ann Engstrom
text: Service was great. Food not so much. I had the meatball sub. Meatballs were totally bland. Don't recommend the meatballs.

name: Brian Svejkosky
text: Love this place and the lunch special. For the price and quality of food, it's hard to beat.

name: Barbara Snider
text: My introduction to Brixx  recently was the highlight of my visit to Fishers over Christmas weekend!!  I was amazed with the extensive menu of very unusual ingredients and combinations.  Be sure to take the time to study ALL the choices!  I …More

name: Eric Baker
text: Amazing Pizza! Good Beer Selection! Awesome and Friendly Staff! I go here at least once a week.

name: Daniel Marshall
text: Fantastic service and amazing food! Recommended for sure!

name: Shirley C
text: Love there 4x4 pizza. Not real expensive.

name: Justine Soltis
text: Amazing Pear and Gorgonzola pizza.

name: Caleb Sorrell
text: I'll try to keep this short and helpful. I love their breadsticks and cheese and ordered them before they shut down for around $6. I stopped in today for the first time since they reopened and ordered them to go (not looking at the menu) …More

name: Jim Clifford
text: A great staff sometimes very accommodating for your parties of more than 5 something you should consider obviously this is comfort food and comfort food goes a long way helping people enjoy an evening. There is no exception to enjoyment at …More

name: Elizabeth Thompson
text: We really enjoyed our meal last night. The staff was efficient and engaging. It was s must do again experience  .

name: Andrew Weflen
text: Great food, service and atmosphere

name: Jon Anthony
text: The wings and salad was great the service fell a little short.

name: Storrey Rogers
text: Great and delicious wood fired pizza! The staff was so great and the place very clean and well maintained. Loved the outdoor seating and the prices are decent foe the food.

name: Scott Jones
text: Amazing pizza! Best we've had in the area! Wonderful staff as well!

name: Ruckus
text: Lunch half and half a very generous excellent meal! Very good salad and pizza.

name: leslie frye
text: Pizza is the best I've had locally... it tastes as it came from the real brick oven... Atmosphere is awesome.. to me a great dinner plus with good desert choices and full bar, lots of them fancy beers (don;t drink them but heard of them …More

name: Robert Dragoo
text: Good gluten free pizza. Wish they had their old rotating beer list.

name: Ryan Pauley
text: Place was almost empty, we had a large table, servers tried keeping up best they could

name: W. Everett Hauck, III
text: Rosemary Chicken Mushroom Pizza and the 4x4 is awesome too.

name: Kayla Woodward
text: The chicken florentine pizza was very good. The restaurant has a pizza oven in the center of the room so you can see where the pizza is being made. Good service as well.

name: Michael Durham
text: Great food and service. Some of the best wood fired pizza I've ever had.

name: Jeremiah Perkins
text: This is one of the best places for artisan pizza. They all come in one size but they are so well done in taste and proportions that you can easily get a whole one or take some home for a snack. One of my favorite places in Fishers!

name: N Odell
text: Good service, fancy menu, higher class casual atmosphere.  A little pricey for lunch, but tasty.  Root Beer on tap!

name: Michael Hallenbeck
text: Excellent food and selection.  Great service.  The kids love it, too!

name: Steven Stafford
text: Great food and great staff!

name: Chris Corbett
text: Tasty Thai pizza.

name: Feras Mash
text: Good pizza but small sizes.  They only have one size.  Hard to be one size fits all.. Good beer selection and mice atmosphere

name: Ivan Pongracic
text: Great pizza, nice ambiance, good service!

name: Dawn G.
text: This was the first time i ever visited there and thoroughly enjoyed myself.  The food was wonderful.

name: gymcoachdon
text: Great pizza!  My favorites are Bronx Bomber and 4x4, never disappointed.  Great beer selection and service.

name: Katie Gelhar- Stahl
text: Amazing service and very knowledgeable staff. Highly recommend!

name: pritesh shah
text: Amazing pizza crush and lot of options.

name: Funky Chinaman
text: The food quality has definately slipped & management is fairly clueless about staffing. The staff always seems to be scrambling & management is less than truthful when dealing with young employees. With the current management I wouldn't expect this location to prosper in the long run.

name: Wisam Gherfal
text: I just started going to Brixx for the past 2 weeks. I have tried there pizza, and by far it was the best I have tasted here in Indy. Been living in Indy for 15 years. …More

name: Morgan Kilgore
text: Went here last night for dinner with girlfriends - the service was great and the patio seating outside is huge. Had the rustica pizza and it filled me up but didn’t make me ridiculously full, for sure recommend!

name: Brette Walker
text: We got the Bronx Bomber and it was so good!  We will definitely be back.

name: Jeannie Do Nascimento
text: How can be possible to visit this place, you sited asked for the menu, the attendance wave you and the menu never arrived.  I was no full, but nobody care about us. Think it twice before coming

name: jenn6116
text: Our first visit back since they reopened and it was great! Service was wonderful and the food was delicious. Salads were very fresh and pizza so good!

name: Luke Flaa
text: Good food, nice service, plenty of TV's.

name: TRACI L Campbell
text: Omg we did the pint cycle ( awesomeness) and we pre-ordered our food. They had it all hot and ready for us when we walked in. We felt like VIP. Great food,great service by Robin!

name: Kylee Hale
text: This place is permanently closed, just FYI

name: Brady Huffer
text: If you enjoy sitting there for 15 minutes and no one takes your order, then this is the place for you. I got up and left and went to Greeks Pizza and got a larger pizza with better service.

name: Lee Smoll
text: Great food, great service, friendly crew.

name: Brett Bultemeier
text: This place has some of the best pizza ever. The rosemary garlic chicken was stupid good. This is a MUST anytime we visit.

name: Tania Ruiz
text: Great food and beers, great environment with friendly workers.

name: John smith
text: Affordable pizza with good specials, but service is horrible! I've been there three times and every time the only consistent thing was bad service. I would love to see this place succeed, but they have to train the employees better.

name: Nick Joshi
text: Nice pizza - thin crust - the overall experience is awesome! Pretty nice ambience! Definitely recommend others to visit!

name: Megan Henn
text: The monster caramel sugar cookie with ice cream is LIFE!  Service and food were great.

name: Non*e*ya
text: Pizza was good. Service a little slow but we had new server.

name: Kevin Terstegge
text: Good food, good service. The outside seating is great

name: Eric Hopkins
text: Fantastic pizza and adult beverages... great service

name: alex fields
text:
Awful awful service.

We waited over an hour, after being told a little under an hour, and then when …More

name: Lesley Barker
text: Cauliflower pizza crust! Yumm!!

name: Tom Mohler
text: Quick friendly service. Delicious pizza. Wonderful lunch special, pizza and salad is just the right size.

name: kyle wineinger
text: Wow fast service awesime envorinment and easy parking.

name: Russ Clinton
text: Part of the meal was wonderful, part was so-so and part was very poorly prepared.   Our food was all pizzas and they gave us a free appetizer for our lack of satisfaction.   Not good.

name: Scott Allen
text: Excellent pizza and service. Very cool patio!

name: Patrick Callahan
text: Great Pizza and service!

name: Paul Kruse
text: The Mexican pizza was great. Loved the fresh jalapenos. Good beers as well.

name: Ross
text: Wonderful experience the server kim was very nice and knew the menu very well

name: Williams User
text: Excellent service.  Beautiful Restaurant.  Fantastic breadsticks.  We loved our experience.

name: Tim Loyer
text: I love the Sweet Thai Chicken pizza (I probably got the name wrong) and the lunch special is a very reasonable deal. Good food and friendly service.

name: Barbara Johnson
text: Great pizza and wonderful customer service.

name: Bob Geis
text: Really good salad.  The pizza was good as well.  I had the lunch special.  The service was ok, not bad not great.

name: Lori Watson
text: Best pizza's I'very ever had!  Excellent service!

name: Sarah Kluzinski
text: The staff is incredibly kind and attentive. The bruschetta is out of this world and the prices are very reasonable. Special thanks to Chaz for the great service. We will be back very soon!

name: Justin Moe
text: Got my order to go. Pizza was not good and cold. But I will let the cold pizza slide considering it was "to go". Service was awful, I sat at the counter for about 8 minutes before the manager or server standing 2 feet away even acknowledged …More

name: Taylor Myers
text: They have a great selection of taps and really great pizza and pasta. Love coming here!

name: Karen Diebold
text: Sign up for their email and receive buy two entrees get two free on Tuesdays.

name: Patrick Antrobus
text: Great Pizza, friendly staff, superb deals on brews, overall an inexpensive dinner (especially if you find a coupon in your weekly mailer)!  See you on Tuesdays.

name: Tatyana Hunter
text: Great lunch special! Food was fresh and delicious!

name: Tim Palmer
text: Good variety of pizzas and they always have a good beer selection!  Great beer specials on Monday and Tuesday!

name: Jared G
text: Pizza is great, has that organic feel to it, breadsticks are amazing, and their drink specials are great! Plus after 10pm it's buy one pizza get another free or an appetizer!

name: Sabrina Champagne
text: Excellent Wood-Fired Pizza Place in downtown Fishers.  Bring the family to enjoy lunch or daily specials and local craft beers.

name: Jason Barnes
text:
This area was better as grass parking lot for the fair train.

With that said it wasn't horrible nor great.  Typical chain place with decent …More

name: U H
text: Central location in downtown Fishers, convenient parking in same building block. Excellent service and good food.

name: Eddie Smith
text: Great pizza and food, friendly staff and prompt service.

name: Charlotte Hellman
text: Great pizza and pasta!

name: David Cook
text: Pizza was really good! Nice beer selection, as well.

name: Chris Wood
text: Great wood fired pizza! Creative options for your pie, nice space also and good beer rotations - not fantastic beer rotations, but still pretty good.

name: Jeff Hillman
text: Unique food, craft beer, good service

name: Bill Stovall
text: Very good food, decent on tap list. Great lunch specials.

name: Robert Murphy
text: First visit. Food was good service even better.

name: Steven Williams
text: More crust than toppings.

name: Berri Sherri
text: Great selection. Pizza is good as it is a staple there, but the salads and other selections are tasty as well.

name: Megan Snoke
text: Bad experience last time. I used to give this place a high rating, but I've changed my mind. We got stuck with a teeny little table in a back corner where we were forgotten about. After 15 minutes, I had to go find someone to take our drink order. When my pasta dish came out, the sauce was watery.

name: Joe Kelly
text: Not good for big groups. Took over an hour to seat us. Really no rooms to wait in. We blocked the door. Food is good worth the price.

name: Erica Diebold
text: Great pizza - loved the Bronx Bomber - and Craft Beer with an excellent selection for a great price (BOGO+$2.50 Craft beer on special). Brixx is becoming our favorite place to go for pizza and a beer!

name: Cole Raven
text: Great wood fired pizza, wasn't as good when I ordered carryout but a nice dining experience

name: melissa cahill
text: Great food and great service!  The half and half pizza is amazing!

name: Pakrat68
text: Overall great experience. Download there mobile app for a Buy one Get one free pizza coupon.

name: Greg Eiler
text:
Only came here once but this restaurant is well managed. Bartender was incredibly friendly and surprisingly patient helping me to pick a beer. Very competitive prices & a plethora of pizza options.
Building appeared to be in brand new shape.

name: Steve Ritter
text: Delicious. Lunch special half pizza and half salad!! So reasonable and more than enough food!

name: Joel Fedell
text: I love pizza, but this was a little disappointing. It was just ok, nothing special. The location was clean and the server was nice. I just was not impressed with the food. I'd probably not visit this place again.

name: Braeden Cradduck
text: So glad they reopened! I'm a  connoisseur of margherita pizza, and they have the best!

name: Rebecca Madara
text: To go soda are $1 to expensive!

name: Bradley Banks
text: Brick oven 10 inch pizzas.  great taste good selection of pizzas and beer.

name: A Alexander
text: If I could give a negative number I would.  Service sucked so bad that we didn't stay to eat.   We waited @ the bar for 35 minutes for a table.  The hostesses had forgot about us.  We left after another 10 when I got fed up with the bitchy bartender.  Will never come back!

name: Kristin Seward
text: Good pizza and beer selection. Kids menu is a limited.

name: Matt Barber
text: Good pizza.   Call me impressed.

name: Jessica M
text: Great food, great service!

name: Dustin Gleitz
text: Appetizer are way over priced $9.00 for 5 Koren Meatballs.

name: Alex S
text:
Handled a larger group with ease.
Visited here with out church group, about 16 strong that night for dinner. Our waitress and her assistant made it look easy. Many on separate checks, one that …More

name: Steve Baker
text: Always great food, great service and an large and ever changing draft beer selection.

name: joel johnson
text: Service was great, had pizza good pizza!

name: Nadine Medley
text: Wood burning oven, consistently good service

name: Jonathan Peters
text: Came in an hour before they closed. Basically didn't want to serve us. Decided not to eat anything since they would not serve salad or sandwiches.

name: Josh Richardson
text: Great food and friendly staff. Was lucky enough to get a table for 8 on a Saturday night too.

name: Eric M
text: Friendly staff, food was terrific. Very busy location for Wednesday night.

name: Ajeet Solanki
text: poor service, staff didn't wanted to provide services on Sunday late evening.  brixx is one of our favourite place by won't visit this outlet again.

text: Love the pizza here and great customer service.
